name: MonstaCare
description:
~Small project created for the Amare Game Jam, with non-romantic plot~

🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼

Follow the MC as she becomes the new guardian of an adorable monster-ish beings ~
